Priest of the Earth Daichir:
You are performing a sacred trust, I am always ready to give a blessing.
Karna Maphr! Prosperity! Prosperity! The names of our goddess! Believe it! And then you will be blessed! And your talent, and your abilities - the gift of the goddess, and the glory of your success - also sent down to the goddess of good fortune. So thank her for a favor and bring her victim!
Do not be sad and do not complain, even now we are in a period of hardship and turmoil. Goddess just sent them to us in the trial. And we stand! Believe me, you, and ye shall find! What? What is one of the names Maphr? A blessing!
Do not forget! Goddess of the Earth is always there with you. You always have to be people capable of gratitude to the goddess for her mercy. Be strong in your faith. The goddess is always with us, and we all have to believe in it and follow it. Everything that happens - the idea of the goddess.
Remember this always the same, if you want to grace it always stays with you. Karna Maphr!
